All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Admin
Admin.java The Admin object is a transitory Java Bean object that helps a user call specific information based on their unique identity.
Announcement
This Announcement object holds all the information of the announcement for a particular cohort
Assignment
This Assignment object holds all of the information for a particular assignment.
Attendance
This Attendance object holds the id, name, whether student was present or not and the date for the student
BackupServ
Backup Servlet is designed to let Admin's perform both backup and export functions within MASS, left in the project as a prototype for future improvement as approved by Nermine Aladdin.
Cohort
This Cohort object holds the id and name of a particular cohort
ConnectionPool
Connection pool allows for multiple instances to access the database at one time.
Course
The course class will hold the course_id, course name, and course description This is useful for pulling information about a particular course and displaying it on the screen.
CourseAnnouncement
This CourseAnnouncement object holds the announcements for a particular course
DBOperationsAdmin
This DPOperationsAdmin class handles the information going to and coming from the database for the admin
DBOperationsAnnouncement
This class handles any DBOperations for cohort and course announcements.
DBOperationsAssignments
This DBOperationsAssignments class handles all database operations for the assignments aspect of the application
DBOperationsAttendance
This DBOperationsAttendance handles all of the database operations for the attendance aspect of the application for the student
DBOperationsCohort
This DBOperationsCohort class handles all of the database operations for cohorts aspect of the application
DBOperationsCourse
This DBOperationsCourse class handles all of the database operations for the courses
DBOperationsDocument
This DBOperationsDocument class handles all of the database operations for the documents
DBOperationsFaculty
This DBOperationsFaculty class handles all of the database operations for the faculty members
DBOperationsGeneral
I have created the DBOperationsGeneral class to handle all general database operations.
DBOperationsGrade
This class handles database operations involving grade objects
DBOperationsLogin
The DBOperationsLogin class is used to query the database in order to find the user-type of a given user who is attempting to login.
DBOperationsModule
This class handles database operations involving module objects
DBOperationsSchedule
This class handles database operations involving schedule objects
DBOperationsStudent
This class contains methods that are specific to obtaining student information
Document
This Document object holds the document for a particular student
Faculty
Faculty.java The faculty object is a transitory Java Bean object that helps a user call specific information based on their unique identity.
Grade
This Grade object holds the grades of a particular assignment for a particular student
LogonCon
To use LogonService class, a user must enter credentials with the following prerequisites in mind.
Module
A Module object is a module that is related to a particular lesson.
Schedule
A Schedule object is the schedule that is related to a particular student.
SiteNavigation
The SiteNavigation is to help student user to navigate each student jsp page.
SiteNavigationAdmin
The SiteNavigationAdmin is to help admin user to navigate each admin jsp page.
SiteNavigationFaculty
The SiteNavigationFaculty is to help faculty user to navigate each faculty jsp page.
Student
The student object is a transitory Java Bean object that helps a user call specific information based on their unique identity.
StudentCourse
A StudentCourse object is a course that is related to a particular student.
